'''"From This Day On, We Shall Delight in New Life Together."''' is [[Arlecchino]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* After using [[All Is Ash]], Arlecchino will gain a small ashen-red angel wing on her left shoulder, indicating her C6 effect. This wing is different from the larger one she has when holding her Charged Attack to fly.
